channel.title: Data Science on Shengting Cao's Note Book
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science on Shengting Cao's Note Book

item.title: Data Science Start Package
item.description: Nowadays people want to start learning data science but they don’t know how to start it. Maybe they know statistic concepts and what language to use. In this article, I will list some simple package for new player in the data science to learn. Numpy pandas matplotlib seaborn
